name: emoji-picker
title: Emoji Picker
oneLiner: Emoji selection component with search and categories

apiDoc.name: EmojiPickerContent
apiDoc.description: Emoji selection component with sections for user's custom emojis (NIP-51 kind:10030), aggregated emojis from followed users, and default emoji sets. Features customizable columns, default emoji overrides, and selection callback. Uses createEmojiPicker builder for emoji aggregation and frequency sorting. Exports EmojiPicker.List, EmojiPicker.Content, EmojiPicker.Item, and EmojiPicker.Dropdown variants.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (uses context if not provided)

props.name: columns
props.description: Number of emoji columns in grid
